targets.expr: sum by (pod) (min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_status_running{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:with_pod_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"})

sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:with_pod_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"})

sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:with_pod_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod)

sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:with_pod_info{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod)

sum(last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__range])) by (pod)

sum(last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__range])) by (pod) / sum(last_over_time(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) by (pod)

sum(last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__range])) by (pod) / sum(last_over_time(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) by (pod)
sum(last_over_time(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}[$__range])) by (pod)
sum(last_over_time(container_memory_cache{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}[$__range])) by (pod)
sum(last_over_time(container_memory_swap{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}[$__range])) by (pod)

options.content:
- Raw usage = RSS + Cache
- RSS is actually allocated memory
- Cache = Active + Inactive file
- WSS = Raw usage - Inactive file = RSS + Active file

What to look for:
- WSS reaching limit causes file garbage collection
- RSS reaching limit causes OOM

targets.expr: sum(max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

sum(max_over_time(container_memory_cache{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

sum(max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

sum(max_over_time(container_memory_mapped_file{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
sum(max_over_time(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
